plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you organize them by swiping into categories.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SwipePhoto helps you organize your photos locally on your device by swiping them into custom categories. Your photos stay completely private and are never uploaded or shared.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SwipePhoto lets you take new photos to organize alongside your existing ones. All processing happens locally on your device.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: SwipePhoto can save organized photos back to your library if you choose. This is entirely optional and local to your device.
